rules: Rule1: Provided that the technology is buggy, it is stable.
Rule2: Whenever the technology is buggy, it is performant.
Rule3: If the technology is performant, then it is not stable.
Rule4: Provided that the substance is addictive, it is healthy.
Rule5: Whenever the substance is addictive, it is profitable.
Rule6: Either the substance is addictive, or if the technology is buggy, then it is not stable.
Rule7: Under the condition that the substance is regulated, if it is profitable, then it is not healthy.
Rule8: If it is not the case that the game being released implies it is completed, then the technology is buggy.
Rule9: Whenever the project is not funded, the game is released.
facts: Fact2: It is not the case that the game is completed.
